DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect bean physical form ( whole versus blend ) Beano postprandial response . The postprandial response investigator examine include blood glucose , appetite , metabolic rate , physical symptom , mood . To accomplish aim investigator conduct randomize , placebo-controlled trial overweight obese otherwise healthy ( non-diabetic ) men woman
DOC.brief_title: Body Responses Bean Physical Form `` Beano ''
DOC.criteria: Aged 1855 year old Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.540 kg/m2 Generally healthy A nonsmoker Any ethnicity Free chronic disease take medication dietary supplement know affect energy regulation appetite Beano drug label warning include galactosemia , severe liver kidney disease , allergies sensitivity ingredient Beano Peri postmenopausal woman Pregnant lactate woman ( currently within past 1 year ) Currently diet consume unusual medically prescribed diet Net weight loss gain ( > 5 lb ) within last six month Consuming 1/2c per day legume , include peanut Having take Beano time past 3 month Extreme problem digest bean Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dl Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg Moderate intensity high intensity exercise > 6 h/wk Predicted energy requirement < 2000 kcal/d > 4000 kcal/d
